column2:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledName],

You are wretch and a coward! I challenge you to a duel! Our weapons shall do the talking, and I will prove superior!

Signed, [From.GetTitledName]
I accept the challenge!
Your answer is sent.
I refuse.
The despicable coward [From.GetTitledName] has refused your challenge! Clearly, [From.GetSheHe] has no honour!
Bah!
You stand face to face with your opponent. What do you do?
Choose a tactic.
Use a special ability.
Use an artifact
Flee or surrender.
What tactic will you adopt?
Skirmish
This is a balanced option without advantages or drawbacks.
Manoeuvre
This is greatly effective unless the enemy charges.
Charge
This is only moderately effective unless the enemy chooses to manoeuvre.
What will you do?
Dragon Breath
A powerful attack that requires waiting two turns before being used again.
Arcane Missile
A ranged magical attack, not as useful when charged.
Mana Shield
A very defensive spell that will prevent you from taking or dealing much damage, lasting two turns.
Detonate
A shield that punishes enemies who close in, while being less effective otherwise.
Invisibility
A spell that enables you to more successfully escape from combat.
Mirror Image
A spell that is effective against charging opponents.
Firebolt
A ranged attack that is ineffective against charging enemies.
Blizzard
A spell that is strong against stationary opponents.
Bloodbolt
A ranged attack that works best against manoeuvring or charging targets.
Frenzy
Drive yourself into a frenzy with magic and charge the enemy. Less effective against targets that are also charging.
Curse of Weakness
A curse that decreases the chance of being wounded by your opponent, lasting three turns.
Curse of Tongues
A curse that prevents the opponent from using spells.
Shadow Strike
Invoke the Loa to cloak in shadows and allow you to close in with the enemy. Weak against manoeuvring enemies.
Shadow Shock
Cast a bolt of dark magic at an enemy, being more effective against stationary targets.
Holy Shock
An attack that is more effective against charging targets, and especially against undead or demons.
Blade of Justice
Infuse your weapon with the Light's power, closing in to strike. This is more effective against undead.
Earthbind Totem
Deploy a totem that slows your enemy, decreasing the effectiveness of tactics that require movement.
Totem of Wrath
Deploy a totem that infuses your weapon with elemental fire, helping against charging or stationary opponents.
Grace of Air Totem
Deploy a totem that makes you more agile and aids in manoeuvres.
Healing Stream Totem
Deploy a totem that has a chance of healing you each turn.
Ancestral Protection Totem
Deploy a totem that reduces the chances of you being wounded.
Purge
Render the opponent incapable of using magic for a short while.
Bloodlust
Cause your charging attacks to become more powerful for a short while.
Sunstrike
A close range spell that calls upon the power of the sun, effective against charging enemies.
Invincible Sun
Embody the power of the sun to decrease the chances of being wounded.
Moonfire
A spell that works best against stationary targets.
Starshot
A spell that is more effective against manoeuvring targets.
Death Grip
An attack that pulls an enemy to close quarters, but is ineffective against charging enemies.
Scourge Strike
A powerful charging attack, but that can be evaded easily.
Tiger Palm
A quick attack that is more effective against manoeuvring enemies.
Jade Lightning
A ranged spell that is more effective against stationary enemies.
Apply Lethargic Poison
Apply a poison to your weapon that will improve futures attacks against moving enemies.
Apply Hallucinogenic Poison
Apply a poison to your weapon that will decrease the chances of your opponent to wound you.
Shadow Word: Pain
A spell that is effective regardless of the movements of your opponent, though is weaker than average.
Void Bolt
A ranged spell that works best against distant targets.
What artifact will you use?
[item1.GetFullName]
[item2.GetFullName]
Will you flee or surrender?
Flee
You will attempt to escape the battle.
Surrender
This will end the battle immediately.
You drop your weapon and declare your surrender. Your opponent quickly takes you prisoner and has you hauled off to the dungeon. But at least you are still alive.
You drop your weapon and declare your surrender. While you can walk away with your life, your pride stays behind.
Sigh.
You start to drop your weapon to surrender... only to see your opponent doing the same! You both awkwardly look at each other before slowly backing away in silent agreement.
Let us never speak of this again.

Discretion is the better part of valour, some say. Maybe they are right, for you turn to flee and fight another day. When you risk a glance back to see if you are being pursued... you see your opponent also running away.
Discretion is the better part of valour, some say. Maybe they are right, for you turn to flee and fight another day. As you run, you can hear your foe cursing you as a coward.
At least I'm alive!
Your cowardly foe has turned and fled! Victory is yours, but only through the cowardice of another.
This is a shameful display!
You tried to flee from the duel, but failed.
Your duel opponent has tried and failed to flee.
You have been wounded in the duel!
You have wounded your opponent in the duel!
You have been maimed in the duel!
You have maimed your opponent in the duel!
As you manage to strike a killing blow on your opponent, they also manage to strike one on you. As you lay on the ground dying besides your foe, you wonder if this was worth it.
Yeah, it was.
No, it wasn't.
Maybe you got unlucky, maybe it was a mistake, maybe your opponent just was that good, but you've been struck down and now lay dying.
Damn... it... all...
You have defeated your opponent and stand victorious!
Victory!
And to the victor, the spoils!
Your totem has been destroyed!
You destroyed your opponent's totem.
Your minion has been killed!
Your pet has been killed!
Your construct has been destroyed!

Your opponent has cast the Death Grip spell.
Your opponent has used the Scourge Strike technique.
